# glyphID

**Instance Property**

The glyph identifier, specified as the index into the internal glyph table of the font.

## Declaration

```swift
var glyphID: CGGlyph { get }
```

## Getting information about a glyph info object

- **baseString**: The string containing the character represented by the glyph.

items.description: The string containing the character represented by the glyph.
items.name: baseString
